name: Midas mF-ONE
description: mF-ONE is a tokenized certificate issued by Midas that provides on-chain exposure to Fasanara Capitalâ€™s F-ONE strategy, a diversified private credit and digital asset fund. The token enables qualified investors to access real-world credit returns via a blockchain-native instrument that can be used in DeFi lending markets such as Morpho. mF-ONE tracks a strategy comprising fintech-originated receivables, SME lending, real estate-backed credit, and delta-neutral crypto strategies. With built-in on-chain liquidity mechanics and institutional-grade compliance, it combines TradFi risk frameworks with DeFi composability.
